name: part_007
file: tmp_【#白銀ノエル生誕祭2025】生誕 3D LIVE 睡夢 - suimu -【白銀ノエル⧸ホロライブ】 [eV59GTk0J3s]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_007.mov

scenes.description: Shirogane Noel and Shiranui Flare perform a duet of 'Planetarium'.
A scene transition where Shirogane Noel changes into a school uniform costume.
Shirogane Noel performs 'RELAY', later joined by Houshou Marine and Usada Pekora.

subtitles.original: 一緒に見た 綺麗な空だったから
subtitles.english: Because it was the beautiful sky we saw together

subtitles.original: あの道まで響く 靴の音が耳に残る
subtitles.english: The sound of shoes echoing to that path remains in my ears

subtitles.original: 大きな自分の影を 見つめて想うのでしょう
subtitles.english: I guess I'm thinking while staring at my large shadow

subtitles.original: ちっとも変わらないはずなのに
subtitles.english: Even though it shouldn't have changed a bit

subtitles.original: せつない気持ち膨らんでく
subtitles.english: This painful feeling keeps swelling up

subtitles.original: どんなに想ったって 君はもういない
subtitles.english: No matter how much I think of you, you're no longer here

subtitles.original: 行きたいよ 君のそばに
subtitles.english: I want to go to your side

subtitles.original: 小さくても 小さくても
subtitles.english: Even if I'm small, even if I'm small

subtitles.original: 一番に 君が好きだよ
subtitles.english: I love you the most

subtitles.original: 強くいられる
subtitles.english: I can be strong

subtitles.original: 願いを 流れ星に
subtitles.english: A wish upon a shooting star

subtitles.original: そっと 唱えてみたけれど
subtitles.english: I tried chanting it softly, but...

subtitles.original: 泣かないよ 届くだろう
subtitles.english: I won't cry, it'll reach you, right?

subtitles.original: 綺麗な空に
subtitles.english: In the beautiful sky

subtitles.original: 会えなくても 記憶をたどって
subtitles.english: Even if we can't meet, I'll trace my memories

subtitles.original: 同じ幸せを見たいんだ
subtitles.english: I want to see the same happiness

subtitles.original: あの香りと共に
subtitles.english: Along with that scent

subtitles.original: 花火がパッと開く
subtitles.english: Fireworks suddenly burst open

subtitles.original: 行きたいよ 君のところへ
subtitles.english: I want to go to where you are

subtitles.original: 小さな手を握りしめて
subtitles.english: Clutching your small hand

subtitles.original: 泣きたいよ それはそれは
subtitles.english: I want to cry, it was so, so...

subtitles.original: 綺麗な空だった
subtitles.english: A beautiful sky

subtitles.original: 願いを 流れ星に
subtitles.english: A wish upon a shooting star

subtitles.original: そっと 唱えてみたけれど
subtitles.english: I tried chanting it softly, but...

subtitles.original: 泣きたいよ 届かない想いを
subtitles.english: I want to cry, these feelings that won't reach

subtitles.original: この空に...
subtitles.english: to this sky...

subtitles.original: もう何十回 もう何百回も 震むソラ見上げて
subtitles.english: Dozens of times, hundreds of times, looking up at the shaking sky

subtitles.original: 辿り着いた場所が 運命のダイヤモンド
subtitles.english: The place I arrived at is the diamond of fate

subtitles.original: 何千回 もう何万回も 涙流したきみへ
subtitles.english: To you, who has shed tears thousands, even tens of thousands of times

subtitles.original: ねえ 諦められたことはあったっけ？
subtitles.english: Hey, was there anything you could ever give up on?

subtitles.original: 「憧れ＝限界」だから もういらないよ
subtitles.english: Since 'Admiration = Limit', I don't need it anymore

subtitles.original: そこに留まるなんて もったいないでしょ
subtitles.english: Staying there would be a waste, wouldn't it?

subtitles.original: それぞれの物語 交差する瞬間を
subtitles.english: The moment where each of our stories intersect

subtitles.original: 見つめる意味は
subtitles.english: The meaning of gazing at it is

subtitles.original: 放った夢だけ 大きな弧を描いて
subtitles.english: Only the dreams released will draw a large arc

subtitles.original: はじきれそうな 煌めきを
subtitles.english: A radiance that seems about to burst

subtitles.original: 消えることなく どこまででも
subtitles.english: Without fading away, no matter how far
